description: Replace Bull-based email queue with Temporal workflow. Create EmailWorkflow with activities for: 1) Render email template, 2) Send via SendGrid/email provider, 3) Handle rate limiting, 4) Log delivery status, 5) Retry on failure with exponential backoff. Implement workflow for bulk emails with parallel execution limits. Add dead-letter queue handling for permanently failing emails. Migrate existing queued emails during deployment.
title: Migrate Email Queue to Temporal Workflow
